scroll.label: Get to know us
scroll.content: We craft high-quality cosmetics to enhance your natural beauty, with every detail from formulation to packaging handled with care.

about.title: About Us
about.descr: Established in 1980, PT Astoria Prima is a manufacturing company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that enhance natural beauty and inspire confidence.From decorative cosmetics and facial cleansers to comprehensive skincare lines, we offer thoughtfully curated products designed to meet diverse needs, trusted and cherished by consumers.

vision.label: The Vision Behind the Beauty
vision.sublabel: Becoming a beauty trendsetter for our customers, continuously delivering innovative products, and building long-term partnerships.

list.label: Empowering beauty innovation.
list.sublabel: Creating the best experience in product development

list.label: Your Partner in beauty.
list.sublabel: High standards in a dynamic beauty industry

offers.label: All Product
offers.sublabel: Discover Astoria's product collection, developed with innovative raw materials and new formulas, tailored to diverse skin experiences.

services.title: Our Services
services.descr: We specialize in manufacturing high-quality skincare and cosmetic products with precision and care. Our services include R&D, formulation, packaging design, filling, and private labeling—all under one roof to ensure consistency and excellence.

slider.title: Concept & Design
slider.subtitle: Astoria Prima helps create product concepts and packaging designs that align with your brand identity.

slider.title: Product Development
slider.subtitle: Customized formulations and microbiological testing to ensure products are safe, innovative, and effective.

slider.title: Manufacturing & Production
slider.subtitle: A modern production process with high standards, including neat and consistent filling and packing.

slider.title: Regulation & Compliance
slider.subtitle: Comprehensive support for BPOM, Halal, IP, and MOM certifications to ensure products are market-ready and compliant with regulations.

list.title: Discovery Consultation
list.subtitle: Let's talk about your vision.We begin by understanding your brand, goals, and product ideas. Whether you're starting from scratch or scaling an existing line, we're here to guide you.

list.q: What is Astoria Prima for Cosmetics and Skincare?
list.a: Astoria Prima provides comprehensive cosmetic and skincare production services, from formulation and licensing management to manufacturing and delivery—customized to fit your brand's unique needs.

list.q: What is the Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) at PT. Astoria Prima?
list.a: At Astoria Prima, we offer an MOQ starting from 2,500 pieces per variant. This quantity is designed to remain friendly for new brands looking to start their business, while still ensuring efficiency in the production process and maintaining product quality.

list.q: What are the requirements to produce at Astoria Prima?
list.a:
For individuals: brand registration certificate/proof, owner's ID card, and individual business identification number (NIB).
For businesses: brand registration certificate/proof, director's ID card, company NIB, and deed of establishment.

list.q: Can I proceed with production without visiting the factory?
list.a: Absolutely. Our Sales & Marketing team is ready to assist you with all administrative needs, both online and offline.

list.q: Can I request a product sample first?
list.a: Yes. Please contact our Customer Service first, and you will then be directed to a Marketing PIC for further assistance.

list.title: Retinol vs Retinal: Apa Bedanya dan Mana yang Tepat untuk Kulitm
list.content: Kalau kamu sering membaca tentang skincare, pasti sudah tidak asing dengan istilah retinoid. Bahan aktif ini sering disebut-sebut sebagai “gold standard” untuk melawan tanda penuaan. Tapi di balik nama besarnya, ada banyak turunan retinoid, dan yang paling sering dibicarakan adalah retinol dan retinal.

careers.title: Join the Team
careers.subtitle: Explore your future with Us. Discover exciting career opportunities and start your professional journey at Astoria Prima.
